name: browser_snapshot
description: Capture accessibility snapshot of the current page, this is better than screenshot

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.

interactive.description: When true, only include interactive elements in the snapshot. Defaults to false.

maxDepth.description: Maximum depth for snapshot output. Defaults to 20.

compact.description: When true, outputs a more compact snapshot format. Defaults to false.

selector.description: Optional CSS selector to scope the snapshot to a subtree.

includeDiff.description: When true, include a diff vs the previous snapshot for this tab. Defaults to false.

take_screenshot_afterwards.description: When true, takes a screenshot after snapshot completes. Defaults to false.
